[[Persepolis F.C.|Persepolis]] faced [[Sepahan Esfahan FC|Sepahan]] in this final game. The first leg took place on September 13, 2006 at 17:40 [[Iran Standard Time|local time]] ([[UTC+3:30]]) at [[Azadi Stadium]] in [[Tehran]] and the second leg took place on September 22, 2006 at 15:00 [[Iran Standard Time|local time]] ([[UTC+3:30]]) at [[Naghsh-e-Jahan Stadium|Naghsh Jahan Stadium]], [[Esfahan]]. == Format == The rules for the final were exactly the same as the one in the previous knockout rounds. The tie was contested over two legs with [[Away goals rule|away goals]] deciding the winner if the two teams were level on goals after the second leg.
